item.title: The All American Rejects - Gives You Hell - Key of E - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Gives You Hell by The All American Rejects from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, A7, B, C♯m7, E, F♯m, G♯m.

item.title: Colbie Caillat - Fallin' For You - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Fallin' For You by Colbie Caillat from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, B, C♯m7, E, F♯m, G♯m.

item.title: Eric Clapton - Change The World - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Change The World by Eric Clapton from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, A6, A7, B, Bm7, Cm7, C♯m7, E, E7, Esus4, F♯m, Gm, G♯, G♯m.

item.title: Third Eye Blind - Never Let You Go - Key of E - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Never Let You Go by Third Eye Blind from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, B, E.

item.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Under The Bridge - Key of E - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Under The Bridge by Red Hot Chili Peppers from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Am, B, C♯m7, E, Emaj7, F, G.

item.title: Dobie Gray - Drift Away - Key of B - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Drift Away by Dobie Gray from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: B, C♯m7, E, F♯.

item.title: Eric Clapton - Layla - Key of F - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Layla by Eric Clapton from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Am, B, B♭, C, C♯m7, D, Dm, E, F♯m, G♯.

item.title: Rob Thomas - Hold On Forever - Key of E - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Hold On Forever by Rob Thomas from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, B, E, F♯m.

item.title: Michael Bublé - Everything - Key of D - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Everything by Michael Bublé from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Am, B, Bm7, C♯m7, D, E, E7, F♯, G, Gm, G♯, G♯m.

item.title: The White Stripes - Apple Blossom - Key of Am - BruderMaister
item.description: Play along video for the song Apple Blossom by The White Stripes from the channel BruderMaister. Chords used in the song: Am, Am7, B, Dm, E, G.

item.title: Josh Turner - Your Man - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Your Man by Josh Turner from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A♯m7, B, C♯7, F♯, G♯m.

item.title: Elle King - Ex's & Oh's - Key of Em - Fredonia Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Ex's & Oh's by Elle King from the channel Fredonia Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: A, B, B7, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: MercyMe - I Can Only Imagine - Key of E - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song I Can Only Imagine by MercyMe from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: A, B, C♯m, E.

item.title: Hugh Jackman & The Greatest Showman Ensemble - From Now On - Key of A - Fredonia Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song From Now On by Hugh Jackman & The Greatest Showman Ensemble from the channel Fredonia Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: A, B, C♯m, E.

item.title: Slayer - Raining Blood - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Raining Blood by Slayer from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: A, B, B♭, D, E♭, E♭m.

item.title: Bobby McFerrin - Don't Worry Be Happy - Key of B - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Don't Worry Be Happy by Bobby McFerrin from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: B, C♯m7, E.

item.title: Tim Curry & Original Roxy Cast - The Time Warp - Key of A - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song The Time Warp by Tim Curry & Original Roxy Cast from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: A, B, B7, C, D, E7, F, G.
